title: Finding the X- and Y- Intercepts
text: $$x+y=-2$$. The x-intercept can be calculated by the equation $$x=-2$$, and the y-intercept can be calculated by the equation $$y=-2$$. Solving these equations, we get the x-intercept as $$-2$$ and the y-intercept as $$-2$$. $$-2+\left(-2\right)=-4$$
